      • entityList

        public static final java.util.List<java.lang.String> entityList

      • expired

        protected boolean expired
        Represents whether the conversation is expired or not.

        The expired variable is a boolean variable that indicates whether the conversation has expired or not. If the value is true, it means the conversation has expired. Otherwise, if the value is false, it means the conversation is still active.

        This variable is used in the Conversation class to track the expiration status of a conversation. It is protected, which means it can be accessed by subclasses within the same package or in other packages that extend the Conversation class.

        See Also:
        Conversation
